title: Chiropractors Ames & Boone, IA | Chiropractic Clinic
description: Ames Chiropractic & Wellness offers a variety of back & neck pain treatments in Ames & Boone, IA. Helping people get well since 2018. Call 515-232-3374.
cleaned_text: Dr. Andrew Anthofer provides you and your family with wellness chiropractic care. Keeping you and your family happy and healthy for a life time. Our chiropractic services include Activator Methods, ArthroStim instrument adjusting, Thompson Drop Technique, Gonstead, and diversified chiropractic methods. Ames Chiropractic & Wellness Center 819 W Lincoln Way Suite B Ames, IA 50010 515-232-3374 Business Hours: Monday: 8:30 AM - 1:00 PM 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM Wednesday: 8:30 AM - 1:00 PM 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM Thursday: 8:30 AM - 1:00 PM 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM Chronic pain in any part of your body can lead to a reduced quality of life and impede you from doing the things you used to love. Don't hesitate in eliminating that pain with a natural, personalized treatment plan. Contact Ames Chiropractic and Wellness Center, and learn about the benefits that outstanding chiropractic treatment can have on your personal health and wellness. Our chiropractors have provided outstanding care to Ames and Story County, IA's residents, and we are always happy to take on new patients.
